title: National Government Services Portal
description: National Government Services Portal of India provides single window access to services offered by the various Indian Government entities. This Portal is an initiative under the India Portal Project and has been designed and developed by National Informatics Centre (NIC), Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology, Government of India.

items.title: Apply for Indian Citizenship
items.description: Indian citizenship can be acquired by birth, descent, registration and naturalization. The conditions and procedure for acquisition of Indian citizenship as per the provision of the Citizenship Act, 1955

items.title: Apply for Indian Citizenship Under CAA
items.description: A special provision exists for the submission of applications for Indian Citizenship under the Citizenship Amendment Act of 2019. It is specifically for individuals who entered India on or before 31st December, 2014, and belonging to Hindu or Sikh or Buddhist or Jain or Parsi or Christian community from Pakistan or Afghanistan or Bangladesh.

items.title: Passport Seva - Check Passport Appointment Availability
items.description: The Check Appointment Availability feature on the Passport Seva portal helps users find available slots for passport-related appointments. By entering their region or Passport Seva Kendra (PSK) details, applicants can view the dates and times for scheduling their appointments. This tool aids in planning and ensures a smooth application process by allowing users to book convenient appointment slots.

items.title: Passport Seva - Apply for Tatkaal Passport Service
items.description: The Tatkaal Passport Service is designed for individuals who require their passports urgently. This expedited service on the Passport Seva portal allows applicants to receive their passports faster than the regular process. Applicants must submit additional documents and pay a higher fee to avail of this service. The Tatkaal scheme ensures quick processing and delivery of passports.

items.title: Passport Seva - Apply for Ordinary Passport
items.description: The Ordinary Passport service on the Passport Seva portal enables Indian citizens to apply for a standard passport. This service involves filling out an application form, submitting required documents, scheduling an appointment, and attending a personal interview. The Ordinary Passport is intended for regular travel purposes, including business, tourism, and personal trips abroad.

items.title: Passport Seva - New User Registration for Passport Services
items.description: The New User Registration on the Passport Seva portal allows individuals to create an account for accessing various passport services. Users need to provide essential details such as name, date of birth, email, and mobile number to register. Upon successful registration, users can apply for new passports, renewals, and other related services.

items.title: Apply for No Objection Return to India (NORI) in case of Pakistani Nationals living in India, Haryana
items.description: This service is to apply for No Objection Return to India (NORI) in case of Pakistani Nationals living in India from Police Department. This is a G2C service. Applicants need  register to apply for this service. Individuals can apply for this service.

items.title: Apply for NOC For Indian living in abroad, Haryana
items.description: This service is to apply for NOC For Indian living in abroad from Police Department. This is a G2C service. Applicants need to register to apply for this service. Individuals can apply for this service.

items.title: Know the Status of Your Passport Application, Kerala
items.description: This service is to Know the Mobile Passport Police Application, Kerala

items.title: Apply for Citizen Information, THUNA is a new venture of Kerala Police,, Kerala
items.description: This service is to apply for Citizen Information, THUNA is a new venture of Kerala Police,, Kerala

items.title: Apply for Citizen Trip, THUNA is a new venture of Kerala Police, Kerala
items.description: This service is to apply for Citizen Trip, THUNA is a new venture of Kerala Police, Kerala

items.title: e-Register - eSanad
items.description: Citizens may retrieve the Apostille by specifying the Apostille/Attestation number; as per the Apostille Convention, Ministry of External Affairs (MEA), a Competent Authority to issue Apostilles in electronic form that are maintained in e-registers

items.title: Online Attestation - eSanad
items.description:
Ministry of External Affairs provides eSanad, an online document verification/attestation/apostille service for verification of 
documents & certificates in a contactless, faceless, cashless and paperless way for Indian citizens, foreigners who have obtained documents from document issuing authorities (DIAs) in India.

items.title: User Registration - MEA IFS Officials
items.description: Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officials may register online using their credentials such as designation, batch, station of posting, Compulsory Foreign Language (CFL), Other Foreign Languages (OFL)

items.title: MEA Online Login for IFS Officials
items.description: Indian Foreign Service (IFS) officials may log in using their user name and password

items.title: Registration As a Citizen of India Under Section 5(1)(a) of the Citizenship Act, 1955 Made by a person of Indian Origin
items.description: Ministry of Home Affairs offers online service to allow Registration As a Citizen of India Under Section 5(1)(a) of the Citizenship Act, 1955 Made by a person of Indian Origin.

items.title: Registration As a Citizen of India Under Section 5(1)(c) of the Citizenship Act, 1955 Made by a person Who is/has been married to a Citizen of India
items.description: Ministry of Home Affairs offers online service to allow Registration As a Citizen of India Under Section 5(1)(c) of the Citizenship Act, 1955 Made by a person Who is/has been married to a Citizen of India.

items.title: Declaration of Renunciation of Citizenship Under Section 8 of the Act Made by a Citizen of India
items.description: Ministry of Home Affairs offers online service to allow Declaration of Renunciation of Citizenship Under Section 8 of the Act Made by a Citizen of India

items.title: Declaration of Intention to Resume Indian Citizenship Under Section 8(2) of the Act made by a person
items.description: Ministry of Home Affairs offers online service to allow application for Declaration of Intention to Resume Indian Citizenship Under Section 8(2) of the Act made by a person.

items.title: Registration of a minor child Under Section 5(1)(d) of The Citizenship Act, 1955
items.description: Ministry of Home Affairs offers online service to allow application for registering a minor child under Section 5(1)(d) of the Citizenship Act, 1955
